citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:20 pm on 30-
NOV-23
Arrived on property, no one was available. USDA called the two phone numbers provided by the licensee and left a
message, then waited on site. After 15 minutes another car pulled up, USDA spoke with the licensee's Grandmother who
was able to make contact with the licensee by phone. The licensee stated she was working and unavailable today. USDA
informed the licensee this would be an attempted inspection and inquired about a change in hours available. Customer
stated she would try to figure out a schedule and get back to us.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:20 pm on 30-
NOV-23 
 
Arrived on property, no one was available. USDA called the two phone numbers provided by the licensee and left a 
message, then waited on site. After 15 minutes another car pulled up, USDA spoke with the licensee's Grandmother who 
was able to make contact with the licensee by phone. The licensee stated she was working and unavailable today. USDA 
informed the licensee this would be an attempted inspection and inquired about a change in hours available. Customer 
stated she would try to figure out a schedule and get back to us. 
 
 
End Section
